before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"chh8q","text":"This protocol assumes protein samples have been resuspended in 1x protein extraction buffer (62.5 mM Tris-HCl (pH 6.8), 2 % SDS (w/v); 10 % glycerol (v/v); 2.5% 2-mercaptoethanol (v/v) ) and the dilution factors were determined in relation to processing of 3 size 7 Humboldt leaf disks resuspended in   of buffer. Preliminary tests should be made when working with different samples or volumes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":301,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8f84a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"450","guid":"091ECF203C0111EB85BFF59C58A50ECC","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"er629","text":"Procedure for quantification of protein concentration using a Qubit 4 Fluorometer. The procedure follows the manufacturer's instructions, this version is adapted for use with samples that have been extracted in protein extraction buffer as part of processing soybean leaf tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20afj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4d68","text":"Consult the manual for further details:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ci3bi","text":"https://assets.thermofisher.com/TFS-Assets/LSG/manuals/Qubit_Protein_Assay_UG.pdf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":81}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E3EBBEDE38C711EBA61A0A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://assets.thermofisher.com/TFS-Assets/LSG/manuals/Qubit_Protein_Assay_UG.pdf"}}}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"94tsv","text":"QubitTM protein assay kit (Life Technologies; Q33211)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":5,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":6}],"data":{}},{"key":"e71ju","text":"QubitTM assay tubes (Life Technologies; Q32856)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":5,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":6}],"data":{}},{"key":"947ap","text":"QubitTM 4 Fluorometer (Life Technologies; Q33238)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":5,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":42,"length":6}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"1028538138C911EBA61A0A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/Q33211?ICID=search-Q33211#/Q33211?ICID=search-Q33211"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"102853EA38C911EBA61A0A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/Q32856"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"1028542938C911EBA61A0A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/Q33238#/Q33238"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6hktc","text":"Create a working solution of Qubit assay buffer by diluting the reagent 1:200 in the provided buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgdbs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c45cf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1hb62","text":"The final volume in each tube must be 200 µL. Each standard tube requires 190 µL of Qubit working solution, and each sample tube requires anywhere from 180–199 µL. Therefore prepare a sufficient Qubit working solution to accommodate all standards and samples.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddovh","text":"Dilute sample 1:50 (  dH2O +   sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":24,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"amauc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9s3p7","text":"","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i2mo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fg5ae","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"196","guid":"72A6549038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":"61044","label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"79DCCBE038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":"61045","label":"","unit":1}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9nrci","text":"After taking into consideration the Qubit dilution factor (1:20; 10 μL sample + 190 μL qubit assay buffer) the sample being analyzed has been diluted 1:1000. This should give a value in the linear range for qubit (1.25-25 μg/mL). ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3ibo8","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"82nrk","text":"The dilution is also important to reduce the impact of SDS and 2-mercaptoethanol on quantification. The concentration of SDS must be \u003e0.2 %, and 2-mercaptoethanol \u003e 20 mM in the 10 μL sample added to the assay. The concentration of SDS in PEB is 2 %, and 2-mercaptoethanol 335 mM, so diluted 1:50 yields [SDS] 0.04 % and [2-mercaptoethanol] 6.7 mM, which is in the acceptable range.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cftbq","text":"Add   of Qubit working solution to a fresh Qubit assay tube, one for each sample to be analyzed (including the three protein standards)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a8lq8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"190","guid":"6DD6CB2038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":"61046","label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1cmu3","text":"Add   of protein standard to the appropriate tube and mix by vortexing  s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4pkcm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"6A94234038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":"61047","label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3,"guid":"4032D56038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":"61528","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aaud3","text":"Add   of diluted sample to the appropriate tube and mix by vortexing   s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"46ha9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"64B106F038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":"61048","label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3,"guid":"516E746038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":"61529","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5av6r","text":"Allow samples to incubate at room temperature for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"99acj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"5D4E287038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":"61530","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1u0va","text":"Measure protein sample concentration using the Qubit, following the instructions on the machine (i.e. start by measuring the standard curve).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"30ad","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"124oi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dq2ma","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dijf7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":159},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":170}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7naa5","text":"Remember to adjust measured values according to the dilution factor applied. In this example, after taking into consideration the Qubit dilution factor (1:20;   sample +    Qubit assay buffer) the sample has been diluted 1:1000","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5kpaq","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"10","guid":"B8FB657038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":0,"label":"","unit":1},"mutability":"","type":"amount"},"1":{"data":{"amount":"190","guid":"BC59D2B038C811EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","id":0,"label":"","unit":1},"mutability":"","type":"amount"}}}},"1":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"","data":{"id":2183,"brand":"Invitrogen","can_edit":0,"guid":"030FA13038C911EBA47F3B5A25172EC7","link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/Q33238#/Q33238","name":"Qubit™ 4 Fluorometer, with WiFi","sku":"Q33238","specifications":null,"type":"Fluorometer","vendor":{"id":95,"name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific","link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":null}}}}
